definition: best/(you) had better (do what we suggest)
most/the most/-est (superlative suffix)
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
He laughs best who laughs last.
pinyin: shei2 xiao4 dao4 zui4 hou4 , shei2 xiao4 de2 zui4 hao3
containing_words.word: 誰笑到最後，誰笑得最好

definition: He laughs best who laughs last.
pinyin: shei2 xiao4 zai4 zui4 hou4 , shei2 xiao4 de2 zui4 hao3
containing_words.word: 誰笑在最後，誰笑得最好

sentences.english: If you believe Sony it's still the best camera even without OIS.
sentences.chinese: 如果你相信索尼儘管沒有光學防抖仍然是最好的相機。

sentences.english: Knowing your own darkness is the most prhvacticing way for deinging with the darknesses of other people.
sentences.chinese: 理解自身的暗淡，是對待他人暗淡一面的最好方法。

sentences.english: Sometimes the best answer is silence.
sentences.chinese: 有時沉默是最好的答案。

sentences.english: Suzhou learn English where? World international English your best choice.
sentences.chinese: 蘇州學英語哪裏去？沃爾得國際英語你的最好選擇。

sentences.english: This graphite filled material offers the best bearing surface with hard chrome plated piston rod.
sentences.chinese: 這石墨填充材料提供了硬鍍鉻活塞桿最好的軸承表面。

sentences.english: Preferably the starting material is dissolved in methanol and a stoichiometric excess of ammonium hydroxide is added.
sentences.chinese: 原料最好溶解於甲醇並加入過量氫氧化銨。

sentences.english: I find the best way to do this is to scrape them with an X-acto knife.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得最好的方法這樣做是爲了刮他們的X雅刀。

sentences.english: I prefer some sort of oversizedr level. preferstomair-conhly the twentieth floor or higher.
sentences.chinese: 我嗜好較高層的，最好是二十樓或以上。

sentences.english: This week on the gadget Show, we find out what the best printers on the market are.
sentences.chinese: 在本週的小器具展上我們發現了市場上最好的打印機。

sentences.english: It wouldn't hurt to read over my notes.
sentences.chinese: 最好能再讀一遍我的筆記。

sentences.english: Zero stock is the best way for inventory control.
sentences.chinese: 零庫存是庫存管理最好的發展方向。

sentences.english: The guy warned me that you have to knock on the door first to scatter them away.
sentences.chinese: 店員警告我說開門前最好先敲敲門，以便把它們嚇跑。

sentences.english: We had better take less than 65 grammes fat every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天攝入的脂肪量最好不要超過65克。

sentences.english: Pot- bellied pigs make the best pets.
sentences.chinese: 大肚皮豬是最好的寵物。

sentences.english: Theoretically, the best sunscreen has the highest SPF number.
sentences.chinese: 理論上來說，最好的防曬霜的防曬係數也就最高。

sentences.english: One of the best sites to find gas-related information is GasBuddy.com.
sentences.chinese: 便是一個你能獲得與汽油相關信息的最好的網站之一。

definition: as much as possible/to the greatest extent
remember at all costs
don't!/must not
in order to avoid/so as not to
to avoid as taboo/to avoid by all means
to propose/to suggest/to recommend/proposal/suggestion/recommendation/CL:個|个[ge4],點|点[dian3]
if/in case/in the event that
not suitable/inadvisable/inappropriate
to take note of/to pay attention to
to avert/to prevent/to avoid/to refrain from
suitable/fitting/appropriate
next/secondly
or/possibly/maybe/perhaps
(so as) to avoid/to prevent/(just) in case
suitable/appropriate
if (coming after a conditional clause)
